title: Supernova
name: Starbit - Supernova
printed_effect:
This Starbit cannot be Normal Cast. When you
Special Cast this Starbit with another Starbit's
effect, it gains the effect "if this Starbit would be
destroyed, first you may Nexus all Spirits from
it. If you do, draw a card. Then it is destroyed."
effect: This Starbit cannot be Normal Cast. When you Special Cast this Starbit with another Starbit's effect, it gains the effect "If this Starbit would be destroyed, first you may Nexus all Spirits from it. If you do, draw a card. Then it is destroyed."
